answers.answer: I have had it with all my pregnancies everything will be fine just keep doin what your doin watching what you eat and taking your medicine I'm 35 weeks and this is my third pregnancy and my third time having gestational diabetes and to be honest sometimes I cheat on my diet but all my babies have been great I have a healthy 6 yr old and a healthy 3 yr old good luck
As long as your numbers are good than all is fine. I get Gd when prego and I'm due with my fourth in June. All healthy babies. I test 4x a day good numbers mean healthy baby.

question: I'm almost 36 weeks pregnant and everyday I worry about my baby. I have gestational diabetes and take medication for it and even watch what I eat. Any other moms going through this??
title: gestational diabetes
